Package com.mousebird.maply

Interface Summary
MaplyController.GestureDelegate Use this delegate when you want user interface feedback from the maply controller.
QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource The Tile Source is the interface used to actually fetch individual images for tiles.
QuadPagingLayer.PagingInterface This is the interface paging delegates must fill in.
RemoteTileSource.TileSourceDelegate The tile source delegate will be called back when a tile loads or fails to load.
 

Class Summary
AnimateTranslate Animates a translation (and/or zoom) from the current point to a new one.
AnimateTranslateMomentum Implements a translation with momentum to a new point.
AttrDictionary The attribute dictionary is a collection of name/value pairs.
ComponentObject The Component Object tracks the various geometry, textures, and outlines associated with a given call to addVectors, addScreenMarkers, etc...
CoordSystem The coord system is a very simple representation of the coordinate systems supported by WhirlyGlobe-Maply.
GeometryUtils A collection or random geometry utilities that aren't associated with particular objects.
GestureHandler Implements the various gestures we need and handles conflict between them.
Identifiable Base class for identifiable objects on the Maply side.
LabelInfo We use this class to designate attribute shared by a group of labels.
LayerThread The layer thread runs tasks we want off the UI thread, but still need some control over.
MaplyController The MaplyController is the main object in the Maply library.
MaplyImageTile The Maply Image Tile represents the image(s) passed back to a QuadImagePagingLayer.
MaplyTileID A tile ID represents a single tile for paging.
MarkerInfo This class holds the visual information for a set of 2D or 3D markers.
Matrix4d This encapsulates a Maply4d matrix.
Mbr A simple Maply bounding box.
NamedBitmap The named bitmap lets us track Bitmap objects via a filename or other unique string.
OSMVectorTilePager The OSM Vector Tile Pager reads vector tiles from a remote source, probably the US OpenStreetMap server, and displays them on the screen as the user moves around.
PlateCarreeCoordSystem The Plate Carree coordinate system is just a fancy name for stretching lat/lon out onto a plane in the dumbest way possible.
Point2d The Point2d class is the simple, dumb, 2D coordinate class.
Point3d The Point3d class is your standard x,y,z container.
QuadImageTileLayer The quad image tiling layer manages a self contained basemap.
QuadPagingLayer The quad paging layer is a general purpose data paging layer.
RemoteTileSource The remote tile source fetches individual tiles from a remote image basemap on request.
ScreenLabel The screen label is a 2D label that tracks a location on the map.
ScreenMarker The screen marker is a 2D rectangle that tracks a certain position in geographic (lon/lat in radians).
SphericalMercatorCoordSystem A wrapper around Maply's spherical mercator coordinate system implementation.
TestImageSource Test Maply's image paging by creating an image per tile with the tile ID in the middle.
TestQuadPager Test Maply's quad paging by creating a rectangle for each tile with a label in the center.
VectorInfo The Vector Info class holds visual information related to groups of vectors.
VectorIterator A VectorObject can contain multiple sub-vectors.
VectorObject The Maply VectorObject represents a group of vector features.
 

Enum Summary
MaplyController.ThreadMode
